group.label: PayU MEA Credit Card
group.comment: Click here to sign up for PayU account

field.label: Title
field.comment: Title to be displayed in checkout page

field.label: API Username
field.comment: Title to be displayed in checkout page

field.label: Payment Methods Code
field.comment: Enter supported payment method, one per line.

field.label: Redirect Channel
field.comment: Only use Web if payment method is set to Discovery Miles

field.label: Minimum Order Total
field.comment: Cannot be less than 50.00

field.label: Maximum Order Total
field.comment: Cannot be more than 5,000,000.00

field.label: Notification Url (IPN)
field.comment: If in doubt, accept the default the value

field.label: Redirect Url
field.comment: If in doubt, accept the default the value

field.label: Cancel Url
field.comment: If in doubt, accept the default the value

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Debug data is written to debug.log
